I came out to my mom and my brother and sisters before i started hrt. I then came out to eveybody else a little under 1 month on hrt. Come out when you are ready nobody is pushing you.
Congrats on coming out.
So my mom told my stepfather I am transgender and he said "so he is gay"
You have a little bit more hair then me when I started and I have done 2h of electro and I am about 80% clear give or take.
Its an app on devices you can get it in the app store on the phone and it allows you to chat with other people either in a group or just with them.

I hid me taking estrogen for about 1month what I did is I just put them in a draw in my room and just had the door closed and they never knew. If your doing it for several months it will be harder as more visible changes happen.
So I also have no muscle mass and I had t running through by body but my doctor said the hrt will make my metabolism slower anyway.

WRITING.TEXT: [removed]
I don't know it kinda does not get in the way since I am in hrt or small and usually unerected so it's fine for now

At the begging tucking is hard and wierd but after awhile it gets easier and since I still present male I don't but when I will present female I will tuck all the time. You can tuck and masterbate you will have to untuck.
That's the same way I was always thought everybody wanted to be a girl.
yeah its only one and I know that but shouldn't be both?
I got mine on the first medical appointment.

Everybody there was really nice nobody was there to judge you or anything. My second appt is 3 months after the my first then once a year. I did both a new patient visit and the first medical witch if you live far away make sure to get on the same days it took about 4-5h ish for both appts to be done and to leave.

I went to the informed consent clinic in Philly the mazzoni center to my knowledge it is the closest informed consent clinic nearest to you(and me as we live pretty close). It is a good place to go they are really nice and since you live far away they will usally call in a blocker for you and then call in the sex hormone for you when the doctor is ready. This is atlest what they did for me but appt usually take around 1-2 months to get. And since you live far away they will even work with that as calling in hrt for you.
So when I start estrogen it will start to redistribute then?

WRITING.TITLE: Pc starting up problems
WRITING.TEXT: So get I got back from vacation about 1 week ago my pc been acting weird. So it would not start up when I got home at all took about 20min for it to turn on. So last night is when something else started I restarted my of after I upgraded to windows 10 and then it would turn in but about 20 seconds later would turn off again so nothing would show on the screen even like it was starting up so I went back to windows 8.1. So tonight something happens to so I hit my of lightly with my leg and a sound starting to make though it was just my head set so I restarted couse I could not get it to go away then it would not turn on fully as I just explained would just turn on nothing would show on the screen and 20 seconds later would go off and keep doing the same thing and then I got it to go off and would not turn back as as what happens when I get home. When my pc is running nothing is wrong. After the first thing happens a week ago my computer is fine. What happened this is a custom built desktop built it in February? Specs Intel i5 2x amd radon 290x2x 1tb hard drives,1x Samsung 250gb,850 watt power supply,8gb ram, asrock mother board.

WRITING.TITLE: New school year
WRITING.TEXT: So as my senior year in school is getting closer to start I am staring to become more depressed and upset about having to go to school as a male. I don't want to go to school as a male j want to go as a female but my therpist won't even let me dress as a female out in public.i am going part time to collage and part time to high school. I have an appt at a informed consent clinic 2 days after schools starts and my mom is supportive of my decisions. I have an appt with the psychological there and the md there. I mean I was refereed there by my therpist. I am on vacation and when I get home I will have like 6 days to go shopping and get ready for school.
I have just started training my voice last night. Thanks for your feedback.

He has worked with many other transgender patients bfore. Or does not stress me out at all. My school seems really friendly have never really had a problem with a teacher before. I am using my phone sorry I will try to fix it. I will be at my old one but also going taking collage classes also.

I am in vacation fill the 19 I fly home I am at my uncles a lot 1000 miles away and did nothing does chop so far and since I am flying I can't do any shopping here since it will cost a lot. I know my therpist can't control what I do but it was his recemdation. That's why I posted here for advice on what to do. Yes I want to start presenting this school year as a female and I will be doing part time at collage and part time at the school I been going to. Ans sorry I will try to relax I just don't know what to do.
